describe: Mongolia is a landlocked country in East Asia, known for its vast steppes, nomadic culture, and rich history as the heartland of the Mongol Empire. It is bordered by Russia to the north and China to the south, east, and west.

cities.name: 🏙 Ulaanbaatar
cities.geographical_location: Located in north-central Mongolia, Ulaanbaatar is the capital and largest city.
cities.climate: Ulaanbaatar has a cold semi-arid climate, with long, harsh winters and short, warm summers.
cities.famous_cuisine: Buuz (steamed dumplings), Khuushuur (fried meat pastry), and Airag (fermented mare's milk).

cities.name: 🏝 Erdenet
cities.geographical_location: Situated in northern Mongolia, Erdenet is one of the largest cities and an important mining center.
cities.climate: Erdenet experiences a cold semi-arid climate with cold winters and mild summers.
cities.famous_cuisine: Tsuivan (stir-fried noodle dish), Boodog (meat cooked with hot stones inside the animal's skin).

cities.name: 🏙 Karakorum
cities.geographical_location: Located in central Mongolia, Karakorum is the ancient capital of the Mongol Empire.
cities.climate: Karakorum has a cold desert climate, with cold winters and warm summers.
cities.famous_cuisine: Khorkhog (meat stew cooked with hot stones), Aaruul (dried curd).
